How can I claim the $500 bonus ad credits for new clients that was offered during the The Winning Formula for Health Ads seminar?

To claim the $500 bonus ad credits for new clients, you will need to follow the instructions provided during the seminar. Typically, this involves creating an account on NewsBreak and applying the promotional code or following specific redemption steps. If you have any specific instructions from the seminar, please refer to those. For more detailed guidance on redeeming ad credits, you can check out our help article here: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
I can´t access the article "How to reedem a Newsbreak ad Credit". How can I reedem this credit?

No worries! Here's a quick guide on how to redeem your NewsBreak ad credit:
1. **Create an Account**: If you haven't already, create an account on admanager.newsbreak.com.
2. **Access the Billing Section**: Once logged in, go to the Billing section.
3. **Add Ad Credits**: Under Ad Credits, click on ‘Add ad credits.’
4. **Customize Your Credit**: Choose ‘Customize’ and enter the total value of your gifted ad credit plus at least $1 (e.g., if your credit is $500, enter $501).
5. **Enter Promotional Code**: Input the promotional code you received during the seminar.
6. **Provide Payment Information**: Enter your credit card information and proceed to checkout.
Remember, ad credits are used before any primary payment method like a credit card. If you have any issues or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
